> > I use heritrix-1.2.0 with default profile. The Crawl Scope is
> > DomainScope, but the crawl is not limited to the domain defined 
by
> > the seed.
> 
> In default configuration, the crawler will leave the scope to 
follow 
> redirects or to get embedded items up to a maximum of  
> 'max-trans-hops'.  Change this setting to stop this happening.  
> Currently, if you set this value to zero, the crawler won't crawl; 
it 
> stops with a -63 on first fetch.  This is a bug ('[ 1090564 ] 
> max-trans-hops=0 generates -63 in crawl.log').  Try with a setting 
of '1'.


is that to say, embeds and redirects are not limited by the 
restrictions of DomainScope, HostScope and PathScope, and can only 
be limited by setting max-trans-hops.
